belief: I believe that I am always left out when it matters most.
desire: To be seen and acknowledged by my family during important moments.
intention: To work hard enough so that others will notice and reach out to me.

cognitive_appraisals.description: The event has important consequences for personal goals.
The character has control over the situation.
The event required an immediate response.
The event was mainly caused by somebody else.
The consequences are unacceptable or unbearable.
